raw.question: Fixed popup:blocked_by_browser error by opening Nango Connect UI synchronously before async session fetch
raw.chosen: Fixed popup:blocked_by_browser error by opening Nango Connect UI synchronously before async session fetch
raw.reasoning: Browser popup blockers require window.open() to be called synchronously within the user's click event handler. Awaiting the session token first broke the gesture chain. Solution: open popup immediately (shows loading), then fetch token async, then set token to enable the UI.

retrospective.summary: Fixed Nango OAuth popup blocker issue in login and signup pages by reordering operations to open popup synchronously before async token fetch
